message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I'd like to try to save some money on this purchase.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  However, $11,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. Could you do $13,000? That would make this a worthwhile deal for both of us.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
